title: Andre Iguodala Interview and More
itunes:title: Andre Iguodala Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Golden State Warrior Andre Iguodala stop by where he spoke about his new memoir "Sixth Man", Warriors dynasty, Kevin Durant, Mark Jackson, and more.  Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners still send nude pics after Ayesha Curry admitted that she sends her husband nudes still and terrified of a hack. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a woman who allegedly manipulated the children at a medical facility. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
